content: Ian, I am smoking while reading this! And will until my final rise up the chimney! Having a smoldering coal between my fingers and pale clouds wreathing about in noxious wards creates my world and welcome to it! What will they do when pot is legal? And how does their elite concern for my personal health (at 67) warp when it's a Cuban cigar I'm smoking? But they all love barbecue smoke & those idiotic “s'mores!”
